countryCode.fieldDescription: Please enter the ISO Country Code for this application. ALL CAPS only.
countryCode.name: ./countryCode

clientlibsName.fieldDescription: Give the clientlibs name that you want to use for the division/site. Defaults to globalreference.
clientlibsName.name: ./clientlibsName

authoredDate.fieldDescription: Select the date the page was authored.
authoredDate.name: ./authoredDate

jquery.fieldDescription: Select Jquery version that needs to be applied for the division/site.
jquery.name: ./jqueryVersion

headerFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for header experience fragment
headerFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Header
headerFragmentPath.name: ./headerFragmentPath

footerFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for footer experience fragment
footerFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Footer
footerFragmentPath.name: ./footerFragmentPath

cookieFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for cookie experience fragment
cookieFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Cookie
cookieFragmentPath.name: ./cookieFragmentPath

alertFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for Alert experience fragment
alertFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Alert
alertFragmentPath.name: ./alertFragmentPath

siteLeavingPopupFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for Site Leaving Pop up's experience fragment
siteLeavingPopupFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Pop-up configured for leaving Abbott Site
siteLeavingPopupFragmentPath.name: ./siteLeavingPopupFragmentPath

siteEnteringPopupFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for Site Entering Pop up's experience fragment
siteEnteringPopupFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Pop-up configured for entering Abbott Site
siteEnteringPopupFragmentPath.name: ./siteEnteringPopupFragmentPath

loginFormFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for Login Form experience fragment
loginFormFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Login form
loginFormFragmentPath.name: ./loginFormFragmentPath

languageNavigationPath.emptyText: Add the path for language navigation experience fragment
languageNavigationPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Language Navigation
languageNavigationPath.name: ./languageNavigationPath

siteEnteringPopupNoGeoFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the experience fragment path for Site Disclaimer Without Geo Location check
siteEnteringPopupNoGeoFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Disclaimer Popup configured for Site without Geo Location check
siteEnteringPopupNoGeoFragmentPath.name: ./siteEnteringPopupNoGeoFragmentPath

siteSectionSpecificFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the experience fragment path for Site Section Disclaimer Popup
siteSectionSpecificFragmentPath.fieldLabel: Experience Fragment Variation path for Site Section Disclaimer Popup
siteSectionSpecificFragmentPath.name: ./siteSectionSpecificFragmentPath

backToTopFragmentPath.emptyText: Add the path for back to top experience fragment
backToTopFragmentPath.name: ./backToTopFragmentPath

excludeChildPagesCoveoPush.name: ./excludeChildPagesCoveoPush
excludeChildPagesCoveoPush.text: Do not push child pages to Coveo

localizetagstitle.name: ./localizeTagsTitle
localizetagstitle.text: Localize Tags Title for Coveo Search

searchResultsPage.fieldDescription: Please select the search results page
searchResultsPage.name: ./searchResultsPage

logoutRedirectPagePath.fieldDescription: Please select the page to redirect to on logging out
logoutRedirectPagePath.name: ./logoutRedirectPage

checkoutPagePath.fieldDescription: Please select the page where checkout is located
checkoutPagePath.name: ./checkoutPagePath

newRelicCookiesEnabled.fieldDescription: Check this to enable Cookie Tracking as part of NR Browser monitoring.
newRelicCookiesEnabled.name: ./newRelicCookiesEnabled

newRelicAccountID.fieldDescription: Enter the New Relic Account ID where Browser monitor is set up
newRelicAccountID.name: ./newRelicAccountID

newRelicAgentID.fieldDescription: Enter the New Relic Browser application Id here. Note that monitoring will be enabled only if this value is authored. To disable monitoring anytime make this blank.
newRelicAgentID.name: ./newRelicAgentID

adduuidonpage.name: ./addPageUUIDAsAemExternalIdInPageMetaProperties
adduuidonpage.text: Add Page UUID As "aemExternalId" In Page Meta Properties

combinePaymentCheckoutCalls.fieldDescription: Check this to enable using the new api calls for payments
combinePaymentCheckoutCalls.fieldLabel: Enable enhanced combined payment checkout calls
combinePaymentCheckoutCalls.name: ./combinePaymentCheckoutCalls

hideBreadcrumb.jcr:title: Select this option to turn off/remove breadcrumb from the page
hideBreadcrumb.fieldDescription: Specify whether to hide breadcrumb in the page
hideBreadcrumb.fieldLabel: Select this option to turn off/remove breadcrumb from the page
hideBreadcrumb.name: ./hideBreadcrumb

termsSections.fieldDescription: Add terms sections for the footer

navimage.fieldDescription: Please add Image to showcase in Navigation
navimage.name: ./navImage

includeInHrefLang.fieldDescription: This field is used to check paths that needs to be included in href lang
includeInHrefLang.name: ./includeInHrefLang

hrefPageMetaData.fieldDescription: check the checkbox to display the hrefLang In Page source
hrefPageMetaData.name: ./hrefPageMetaData

siteMapHref.fieldDescription: check the checkbox to display the href Content in SiteMap
siteMapHref.name: ./siteMapHref

hrefLangAlternateUrl.fieldDescription: Please enter the URL to be added for Hreflang sitemap
hrefLangAlternateUrl.name: ./hrefLangAlternateUrl

hrefLangLocale.fieldDescription: This feild is used to override the hreflang attribute of URl generated in sitemap,E.g.en-us
hrefLangLocale.name: ./hrefLangLocale

hrefLangUrls.fieldDescription: Add href lang Urls along with the country and this will be displayed as a part of page meta data.

countryCode.fieldDescription: Please remember to add self-referencing tag Include Language Code(ISO 639-1) and Country Code(ISO 3166-1),e.g.en-us
countryCode.name: ./countryCode

sitemapHreflangUrl.emptyText: Enter the URL to be added for sitemap Hreflang
sitemapHreflangUrl.fieldDescription: Enter the URL to be added for sitemap Hreflang
sitemapHreflangUrl.name: ./sitemapHreflangUrl

enablePWA.fieldDescription: Make your site behave like a native app by making it installable on the visitor's home screen and available offline.
enablePWA.name: ./pwaEnabled

startURL.fieldDescription: Preferred URL that should be loaded when the user launches the web app. If the URL is relative, the manifest URL is used as the base URL to resolve it. When this field is left empty, the feature uses the address of the web page from which the web app got installed. It is recommended to set a value.
startURL.name: ./pwaStartURL

display.fieldDescription: Preferred display mode. The display mode influences how the web app is displayed to the user.
display.name: ./pwaDisplay

browser.text: Browser (Like a web page in a full browser window)

minimal-ui.text: Minimal UI (Like a native app but with minimal navigation browser controls)

fullscreen.text: Full Screen (Like a native app in full screen mode)

orientation.fieldDescription: Preferred orientation of the web app.
orientation.name: ./pwaOrientation

themecolor.fieldDescription: Preferred color for the web app that affects how the Operating System displays the native UI toolbar and the navigation controls.
themecolor.name: ./pwaThemeColor

backgroundcolor.fieldDescription: Placeholder background (splash screen) color for the application page to display before its stylesheet is loaded.
backgroundcolor.name: ./pwaBackgroundColor

icon.fieldDescription: Icon used to represent the web app on the Operating System. Please use a PNG icon of size 512x512 pixels.
icon.name: ./pwaIconPath

trustArcEnable.name: ./trustArcEnable
trustArcEnable.text: Enable the checkbox to author trust arc configuration
